item.title: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls DLC character Yhwach launches December 3 for Season Pass owners, December 10 for all
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Are you ready to face The Almighty?

Bleach: Rebirth of Souls downloadable content character Yhwach will launch on December 3 for Season Pass owners and December 10 for everyone, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Tamsoft announced.

Bleach: Rebirth of Souls is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC Character Yhwach Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Jacob Jazz’s Tamarindo’s Freaking Dinner coming to Switch on December 11
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Horror adventure game currently available for PC.

Celery Emblem will release first-person horror adventure game Jacob Jazz’s Tamarindo’s Freaking Dinner for Switch via Nintendo eShop on December 11 for $14.90, the developer announced.

Jacob Jazz’s Tamarindo’s Freaking Dinner first launched for PC via Steam on June 3, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Jacob Jazz’s Tamarindo’s Freaking Dinner is a first-person horror adventure game and the spiritual successor of Baobabs Mausoleum. The second game of the “Jacob Jazz’s Treelogy.” A mix between a 90s sitcom, Luigi’s Mansion, and the tabletop game Clue!

Welcome to Tagomago’s Mansion.

Allow me to introduce to you Macario Macabro! He’s an exorcist-lite pizza dude that had the bad luck to bring an order to Tagomago’s Mansion on MokingBird MilkyWay Heights 13; the oldest, creepiest, haunted manor in the universe with the most horrific dinner of all!

The stinky cannibal Countess Erzeweth Watory of Walpurgis (The Watracio’s Aunt!) is the host of this infamous dinner, and you must bring the pizza to her. But wait… maybe the dinner is not the pizza… Maybe… it is YOU!

Key Features

  • Meet the Inhabitants – Meet the manor’s seven inhabitants on this dark and stormy night! They have been invited to this horrible mansion by the countess. Featuring a time cycle system inspired by The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask, you’ve got one hour and forty-five minutes left until dinner time to learn their behaviors and find a way to kill them before they eat you!
  • Explore a Haunted Manor – Investigate and explore Tagomago’s Mansion with more than 50 rooms. find useless objects and others with a little more utility. Discover the secrets of this old, haunted house and its sinister history. Full of secrets and people’s skulls, there are maddening rooms that will make you (literally) lose your mind. It’s Maniac Mansion with even more murder, so take care not to get lost inside!
  • Creepy Puzzles and Adventures – Help Macario with your wits and solve puzzles to end these sinister fiends. There are numerous endings depending on the paths you take in this stinky old house full of cannibals.
  • Conversations and… Deaths – Featuring hilarious dialogue and stories in the style of the most famous graphic adventures, this is the tale of Macario Macabro, whom no one knew was already dead… On the day that he died.

Watch a new trailer below.

Switch Announce Trailer
